mapper.insert: insert /** adm.AdmRsrcRolePhs.insert */ into ADM_RSRC_ROLE_PHS( RSRC_ROLE_PHS_ID, RSRC_ROLE_CD, PROC_PHS_ID, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{rsrcRolePhsId}, #{rsrcRoleCd}, #{procPhsId}, #{creUsrId}, sysdate, #{updUsrId}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete /** BizProcPhase.deleteRsrcRole */ ADM_RSRC_ROLE_PHS where 1 = 1 and PROC_PHS_ID = #{procPhsId}
